Lists.desc: In the Reservation of Report Email function of the Fixed Stat/Report > Report menu, fixed the bug where the Weekdays item cannot be checked or unchecked.
In the Open socket count tab of the Fixed APP > Instance Performance Management menu, fixed the bug where no response is followed after clicking Show trace.
Fixed Restored the encoder selection function for SQL details in the Trace analysis window.
Fixed Modified to remove the filtered content of the selected project when changing the selected project of the filter in Flex board (each filter is applied on a project basis).
Fixed In Analysis > Metrics Chart, modified the CSV file downloaded from the widget to include the data in between the start time and end time.
Fixed In Alert > Event configuration, modified the event message example in the metrics event configuration screen.
Fixed In Server list > Server list, fixed the issue where the tooltip message does not disappear when the Monitoring management mode is enabled, resulting in hiding several elements.
Fixed In Stat/Report > Statistics, changed the names of table columns in the HTTP call tab.
Lists.details:
• Transaction → HTTP call URL

  • Service → Transaction

Lists.desc: Fixed In Alert > Event configuration > Log, fixed the composite log event saving failure issue.
• Deprecated Deleted marketing options in Manage account INFO. when the set language is English or Japanese
Fixed In Management > Agent Installation, modified some commands to run the agent during installation of PHP or Go application agent.
Fixed In Home screen > Flex board, fixed the whiteout issue that occurs after selecting a container performance template.
Fixed In Dashboard > Container Map, fixed the whiteout issue that occurs after selecting a node block and then View Detailed.
Fixed In Analysis > Top Object, modified to display the values for table_size, index_size, and bloat_size columns.
Fixed Fixed the issue where loading does not end when the Statistic or Event history menu appears for the first time while the column selection status remains in localStorage.

New The Network Performance Monitoring service is released. The Network Performance Monitoring (NPM) collects and visualize the network communication data for processes to identify any congestions and failures between networks and uses them to improve the network performance.
• Fixed In the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where the agent filtering (okind, onode) is not applied.
Fixed In Dashboard > Cluster Summary, fixed the unit error on the Total Capacity Memory widget.
Fixed In Metrics Chart, fixed the issue where all oids are viewed when all onode and all okind are selected.
Fixed For the namespace project, fixed the issue where the data does not appear in Resource > Object Manifest Topology.
Changed To support object manifests, the master agent version has been changed to 1.5.2.
Changed In Management > Agent Installation, improved the guidance message.
Changed Changed the date on the pop-up guide regarding the end of project V1 support.
Feature In Alert > Event history, added the following features:
Lists.details:
• In the Event time column, added the function to display In progress and Occured during maintenance tags.

  • Added the option to display the Event resolution time column.

Lists.desc: Changed In Project list, modified the popup UI that appears upon deletion of the project (fixed the project name truncation issue).
Changed Fixed the issue where clicking the tooltip that appears by hovering the mouse over the project list in the sidebar, displays the project.
Changed Modified the text displayed when inviting a dormant account to the project or group

Changed In My usage > Project Subscription Status, if the project name is long at the Subscribe window, modified to abbreviate and display the project name as a tooltip displayed when hovering the mouse over.
Changed In Flex board, added the chart legend settings in the Apdex widget.
Changed In Flex board, when saving as a JSON file through the dashboard export function, modified the display of special characters in the file name from deletion to underscore (_).
Changed In Analysis > Metrics Chart, added the function to deselect all agents.
Changed Applied an additional dark theme to the elements that are unavailable in some menus.
Fixed In Real-time alert list, fixed the issue where the notification list does not appear when a group is specified.
Fixed In Alert > Event configuration, modified the following features:
Lists.details:
• In the modification window of the Metrics event tab, modified to move to guides for each language setting when the Guide Shortcut button is clicked.

  • In the JSON export and import step under the Metrics event tab, fixed the issue where the export or import window does not close when the Save and Add to list buttons are clicked.

Lists.desc: Fixed Fixed the issue where the list does not appear intermittently in Notice in the Safari browser.
Changed In the Multi transaction tab of the Trace analysis window, added the function to save the chart and tree settings.
Changed In the Multi transaction tab of the Trace analysis window, added the function to save the project selection status.
Fixed When is selected in the Tree view tab of the Trace analysis window, fixed the issue where other option settings are turned off.
Fixed Fixed the spacing error between button groups in Integrated APP. Topology and Application topology.
Fixed In Analysis > Cube and Perf. trend, modified the UI designs.
Changed In the Monthly server report (Detail) template selection screen of Report, changed the agent selection option's name from Application to Filter.

Fixed Fixed the user account registration issue when Alert > Event history > events are selected > and the processing detail is added in the event detail menu, fixed the issue where the specified user account is not registered.
• Fixed In Dashboard > Instance list, fixed the error where event records on the Event window are not viewed when the Status column is selected that is not in a normal state.
Feature In Analysis > Lock tree, added the following features:
Lists.details:
• Added the query time unit and maximum value tag on the upper right of the Lock Wait Sessions widget.
  • Added the function to display the unable-to-view message when searching for the data within 3 hours while the query period is within 1 month.

Lists.desc: Fixed In Analysis > Lock tree, fixed the whiteout occurrence issue due to a logic load caused by a large amount of locks.
Feature In Resource > Object Manifest, improved to search and compare the object manifests (supports Kubernetes agent v1.5.0 or later).
Changed Changed the name of the Resource > Master meta information menu to Object Manifest.
Fixed Added missing multilingual translations in the following menus:
Lists.details:
• APP > Multi service hitmap
  • Stat/Report > Report

Lists.desc: • Feature In Log Trend, you can select values that are not in the Filter list by directly entering them.
